predicate.note: Frames file for 'function' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No verbnet entry. Comparison with 'work'

example.name: with job
example.text: Arbitrage simply transfers his selling pressure from Chicago to New York, while *trace* functioning as a buyer in Chicago.

example.name: intransitive
example.text: The Asset Privatization Trust, the agency chiefly responsible for selling government-held properties, has recorded sales of more than $500 million since it began *trace* functioning in December 1986.
